pages.text: $(thing)Resource packs$() provides a way to customize textures, models, music, sounds, languages, texts such as the end poem, splashes, credits, and fonts without any code modification. $(br2)These packs can be stacked. $(thing)Resource packs$() type. $(br)$(li)$(thing)Resource packs$() can be placed in the folder $(l)resourcepacks$() within the $(l).minecraft$() folder.
